reviews.review:
Portal é um grande jogo de Puzzle e ação,achei bem legal a mecanica dos portais,a trilha sonora é ótima,os graficos são bons,a história é excelente e cheia de reviravoltas.Além disso o jogo apresenta um humor bem divertido e elaborado.
Minha Nota: 10/10

Portal was an very entertaining problem solving game. The game stretches your perception and teaches you a bit about physics along the way. The problems are interesting and the story line sufficient for keeping you moving. 

I played the game on my Linux machine using the Steam client for Linux. I had no issues with the installation and running of the game.

This game is a welcome part of my gaming history and I know I will play it again in the future.

このゲームめっちゃ面白くないですか？？？？
わりとサクっと数時間（猿ならもっとかかる）でクリアできる程度の長さではありますがすばらしいゲーム体験ができたなと思います。
ゲームの性質上重力方向に対してハチャメチャなカメラ移動をして、そこそこ前のゲームなので解像度的なアレとかが今のゲームとくらべて低いせいもあり結構酔います。
寝不足状態ではやらないのがオススメですが、そうでないなら絶対オヌヌメです。というかゲームで酔うとかどうでもいいんだ。セール中ならこれを買え。価格以上の体験だ。

Das Prinzip ist zwar gut, das Game ist jedoch relativ kurz. Es gibt nur einen Kapitel. Ich empfehle zwar eher Portal 2, doch wenn man schon ein Portal Game anfängt, sollte es das 1 sein. Wenn man nämlich Portal 2 anfängt, nachdem man Portal 1 fertig hat, versteht man die zusammenhänge eher besser.

the cake is a fucking lie smh

Eu sempre quis esse jogo, desde quando ele apareceu na mídia em 2007 na orange box. 
E hoje, finalmente comprei nessa promoção Portal Bundle. 

Não me decepcionei com esse jogo, mas também não me surpreendi.

O jogo é unicamente e exclusivamente lógico. Não adianta bater de frente, não adianta fazer de qualquer jeito. O negócio é parar e fritar um pouco a cabeça.

Meu gameplay foi super-curto, zerei o jogo em 3 horas mas considerei toda a historia como uma introdução à Portal gun. Após zerar abrem níveis mais complexos e outros de time-attack.

Mas enfim, se você gosta de um bom puzzle e já cansou de ficar procurando puzzles em flash pra satisfazer sua sede, esse jogo é pra você.

Agora, se você prefere um COD eu não te recomendo esse jogo de maneira nenhuma, seu bruto.
Portal is a very fun puzzle game in which you test in aperture science with a portal gun
This Game Won The BEST GAME EVER AWARD

If this is your first game on Steam, congratulations.

This is a unique approach to the FPS genre, relying on physics, logic and brainstorming instead of violence and 360 no-scopes. Set in the same universe, timeline and with the exact same game engine as Half-Life 2, but with more puzzle-solving, less intricate plotline and vomit-inducing rapid motion. Brilliant idea, perfect for training the mind in preparation for complex situations i.e. maths exams. Unfortunately, Portal 1 has very little content as compared to its sequel. Even without walkthroughs, you could finish the first game in 4 hours or less. Everything else is perfect, as with most Valve titles.

And yes, the cake really is a lie, but not the other reviews. Remember, GLaDOS is ALways waTChinG yOU.
Short but brilliant
cool game :D

포탈! 나온지 오래되었지만 해보니 오래된  게임이라 생각하기는 어렵군요 포탈을 플레이하기에 앞서 포탈의 에필로그(?) 앞의 스토리를 보고 오는 것이좋습니다. 퍼즐게임이고 호러 게임은 아니지만 분위기가 호러게임 같습니다. 하다보면 분위기때문에 은근 소름돋을 때가 있어요..스토리는 탄탄합니다! 찾아본바로는 엔딩이 바뀌였다는데 바뀐엔딩도 좋고요 게임 클리어를 다한뒤 마지막에 엔딩크레딧과 함께 들려오는 Ellen McLain-Still Alive는 아주 좋습니다.잔잔하면서 다음인 포탈2를 은연중에 예고하는 느낌이랄까? 아무튼 나온지 꽤된 게임이지만 이번에 구입해서 재밌게 즐겼습니다!

Gioco davvero originale e ironico, mai provato qualcosa di simile. Ho apprezzato il lato "fisico" del gioco. 
Unica pecca la durata scarsa del gioco, che può essere estesa rigiocando per sbloccare gli achievment e completando le camere extra avanzate e le sfide.

Jogo excelente possui um bom nivel de complexidade e uma jogabilidade bem interessante, mas as missoes principais (Storyline) são muito curtas, o enredo do jogo parece ser mais uma Beta do que um jogo completo e quando os niveis vão começando a ficar mais interessantes o jogos acaba. São 19 missões ao todo e as missões iniciais são claramente tutorias que servem para explicar uma função da arma de portais ou algum elemento do mapa. Com isso temos, 18 missões de turorial e a ultima é quando você realmente joga. Por ter uma mecanica diferente o jogo acaba deixando um sentimento de vazio. Como se você não houvesse realmente zerado o jogo.

resumindo 10/10

[h1]Portal: 8/10[/h1] - RECOMMENDED

[b]Portal Impressions:[/b]
I won't state anything groundbreaking... this game is simply amazing.
It's simplicity, in design and gameplay is it's strongest side, it does not lie to you about beeing epic, although it kinda is... it does not promise a good story, but you will be entertained. There are actually no characters in this game, but those non-chars will kinda move you.

What obviously stands out is how the game manages two things at once: Teach you how to solve puzzles by solving them and taking always one step further to keep you challanged. There is no hand holding here... just a logic and step by step growing complecity.

It is a small masterpiece.

Developed by Bethesda in 1989, Portal is a revolutionary game. You take on the charachter of Timmy, a professor in selective breeding at Perature Science. By using your skills, you have to make various fine tuned creatures to perform specific tasks, with the end goal of defeating the evil Spaghetti Monster to resucue your pet dog. Amazing graphics considering the time period and the selective breeding mechanics are unrivaled even to this date. Definitly one of those epics that ages well with time. Plot line is a bit shaky in places and some of the games logic isnt really explained, but that doesnt stop Portal from being a great game. Once you beat the game you get access to extra levels, as well as having to play the existing levels in Gaben mode, which sets specific challenges you have to meet. Succeeding in this rewards you with various pictures of our Lord and Master to which it is expected that you masturbate to. 420/69 would play again.

The Cake is a lie!

After experiencing Portal. . . I must say it is the ultimate puzzle game. 

When I first bought Portal, I thought it was just in the same environment throughout the entire gameplay.  However, I was wrong.  There are a long list of places to go, and the story unfolds as you go, though it is not very deep.  The first few puzzles I did were extremely easy, and I thought the rest of the game would be similar.  I was way off.  After just about half an hour of gameplay, you're going to be pulling your hair out and punching yourself in the face.  This game took me 2 hours to beat, and I must say it was well worth the money I paid for it.  However, I paid about $3 for it.  Unless you want to experience the best puzzle game of all time, don't buy Portal for $20.  Wait until it's on sale.  I wish I could say more, but there really isn't much to say.
It's ****ing Portal. Other games get compared to Portal, not the other way around. Buy it, love it and join the cult.

Именно за счёт этого все трудности преодолеваются на ура, ибо с нетерпением жаждешь услышать следующую шуточку от ИИ. 19 головоломок, плюс крайне неожиданный конец, плюс дополнительные усложнённые миссии ждут ваших решений. Кстати, сама механика перемещений настолько просто и очевидна, что складывается впечатление давнего знакомства с ней.

I'm sure there is nothing I can say at this point that hasn't already been said about Portal. Simply put, this game is amazing. The first person gameplay grants a unique perspective as you attempt to solve various puzzles using your Aperture Science Handheld Portal Device. This is far more than simply a puzzle game, however. As you progress through the game, you will receive instructions and advice from an Artificial Intelligence named GLaDOS. It is this interaction, as well as the dark twist the game takes about halfway through, that has made Portal the classic that it is today. The only weakness this game has is how short it is; a dedicated player will be able to complete the game in less than 3 hours. Never fear, completionists will still have plenty to do as beating the game the first time unlocks multiple challenge stages which either change certain elements of the level for increased difficulty or require you to solve the puzzle in the fewest steps, shortest time, or with the fewest portals.

In conclusion, everyone should play this game. Since Steam keeps dropping the price, there is no excuse not to and anyone who considers themselves a true gamer needs to have this classic under their belt. The cake is a lie.
This is one of my favourite games, quick to learn the controls. Despite having a short campaign, it maintains a funny and interesting plot. 11/10 would bang.
